name: Advanced Sensors
description: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action. If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

name: Collision Detector
description: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles. After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1 {charge} to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

name: Fire-Control System
description: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

name: Trajectory Simulator
description: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5 {s}] template instead.

name: Passive Sensors
description: Action: Spend 1 {charge}. You can only perform this action in your Perform Action step. While your {charge} is inactive, you cannot be coordinated. Before you engage, if your {charge} is inactive, you may perform a {calculate} or {lock} action.

name: Sensor Scrambler
description: While defending, if there is a friendly lock on the attacker, you may change 1 of the attacker's {hit} results to a {focus} result.

name: Blank Signature
description: While defending, if you are not locked by the attacker, you may spend 1 {charge} to change 1 {focus} to an {evade} result.
